en.title: Variable Decision Threshold, Two Groups
en.heading: Variable Decision Thresholds for Two Groups
en.explanation: The dataset used so far consists of data from two groups: the 'old' group (older than 30 years) and the 'young' group (younger than 30 years).
en.explanation2: In the following two histograms, the data of the two groups are displayed separately. The bank can choose different decision thresholds for both groups – though it need not.
